'''"Maison Cardinalice's Punctuality"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Maison Cardinalice's Punctuality" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Ash Wood = 8
|Iron Chunk = 8
|sort = Ash Wood;Iron Chunk
}}
